name: Plankie Plankie
description:
Controls

You can move around with the WASD or Arrow keys.
Jump with the Spacebar.
Rotate objects with Q/E and unpin them with F.
Shoot with the left mouse button.
And aim with your mouse.

Description

This is a simple platform puzzle game, where you have to shoot wooden platforms to progress further. When you shoot a wooden platform, it will get pinned, and set a pivot. Now you can use the Q and E keys to rotate the platform to make it easier to progress. There are two different platforms that you'll come across, that will work a little different than a normal wooden platform.
